Children.Name: Coffee Biscuit
Children.Contents:
/waitaddon "Synthesis" <wait.1>
/ac "Muscle Memory" <wait.3>
/ac "Inner Quiet" <wait.2>
/ac "Waste Not II" <wait.2>
/ac "Final Appraisal" <wait.2>
/ac Groundwork <wait.3>
/ac Innovation <wait.2>
/ac "Preparatory Touch" <wait.3>
/ac "Preparatory Touch" <wait.3>
/ac "Preparatory Touch" <wait.3>
/ac "Delicate Synthesis" <wait.3>
/echo Craft finished <se.3>
/waitaddon "RecipeNote"
/click synthesize
/loop

Children.Name: Gillionaire - Eirikur
Children.Contents:
/target Eirikur <wait.0.5>
/send Numpad0

/waitaddon Talk <wait.0.25>
/send Numpad0

/waitaddon SelectString <wait.0.25>
/click select_string2

/waitaddon GuildLeve <wait.0.25>
/click guild_leve_culinarian
/waitaddon JournalDetail <wait.0.25>
/click journal_detail_accept
/wait 0.5

/send Escape <wait.0.5>
/click select_string4 <wait.0.25>

Children.Name: Gillionaire - Moyce
Children.Contents:
/runmacro "Gillionaire - Start turn-in"
/runmacro "Gillionaire - Turn-in"
/runmacro "Gillionaire - Next"
/runmacro "Gillionaire - Turn-in"
/runmacro "Gillionaire - Next"
/runmacro "Gillionaire - Turn-in"

Children.Name: Gillionaire - Start turn-in
Children.Contents:
/target Moyce <wait.0.25>
/send Numpad0

/waitaddon SelectIconString <wait.0.25>
/click select_Icon_string3

/waitaddon Talk <wait.0.25>
/send Numpad0 <wait.0.25>

Children.Name: Gillionaire - Turn-in
Children.Contents:
/waitaddon Request
/send Multiply <wait.0.25>

/waitaddon ContextIconMenu <wait.0.25>
/send Numpad0 <wait.0.25>
/click request_hand_over

/waitaddon Talk <wait.0.25>
/send Numpad0 <wait.0.25>

/waitaddon Talk <wait.0.25>
/send Numpad0 <wait.0.25>

/waitaddon JournalResult <wait.0.25>
/click journal_result_complete
/wait 0.25

Children.Name: Test
Children.Contents:
/target Potkin <wait.0.5>
/send Numpad0 <wait.0.5>
/send Numpad0 <wait.0.5>
/send Numpad0 <wait.0.5>

/send Numpad2 <wait.0.5>
/send Numpad0 <wait.0.5>

/runmacro "TurnIn"

/send Escape <wait.0.5>
